remarks: Cancellation law for extended multiplication.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Dec-2016.)
statement:
xmulcand.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR* ) $.
xmulcand.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR* ) $.
xmulcand.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
xmulcand.4 $e |- ( ph -> C =/= 0 ) $.
xmulcand $p |- ( ph -> ( ( C *e A ) = ( C *e B ) <-> A = B ) ) $.
